website_summaries.verdict: The tiny Bose MusicMonitor computer speakers are ideal for buyers who need the smallest possible speakers, but you can find better-sounding--albeit much larger--alternatives at this price.
pros: remote control for power and volume
cons: size limitations affect sound quality for movies and games

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied for the size of them, and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure they are worth $300, but they do work well for what I was looking for. There are better sounding PC speakers for less, but I am satisfied for the size of them, and would buy them again. On another PC, I have the Klipsch ProMedia 2.1 system, and if you have room, it is cheaper and better sounding - but apples and oranges to MusicMonitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alan Menter

customer_reviews.title: Better alternatives for the price nowadays
customer_reviews.text: The high end of the frequency response is great and flat, but the low end sounds pretty distorted and "cheap". What's good is the portability of it though and how sturdy it is. I recommend pairing this with a separate subwoofer if you have a system that can crossover between them. For the price though I recommend getting the Edifier r1700bt's over these, as they cost less and sound way better, though take more space.
customer_reviews.author: davidtriune

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers for Normal Desktop Music Listening
customer_reviews.text: Bottom Line - These speakers are exceptional for what I needed. I had a pair of similar Bose speakers I purchased over 10 years ago. One of the speakers finally blew out after really heavy use over 10+ year (I telecommute for work), which put me in the market for something similar. I was both surprised at how small they were (approx 2/3 the size of my previous ones) and by how much bass they could put out. That said, I use them as computer speakers and not for audio production nor gaming, etc. I'd be kidding myself if I thought I needed surround sound and a sub. If you do, these might not be the speakers for you.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine F. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Underpriced
customer_reviews.text: These are probably underpriced. they should be priced much higher than at $300 usd. These are probably the best computer speakers in the market.﻿
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Realy very poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for a very poor sound quality. No bass, even putting at maximum on equalizer. For somebody who will hear classical music from a good quality stream in a computer is a trash: no way to make its sound bring up the indispensable spectrum of the music. I have had several Bose speaker very satisfactory, but not this one. A BIG deception and a loss of money.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Antunez

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointing sound. the only thing that brought it to life was the app BOOM2...that helped a great deal. Product support is nonexistant and useless. I would not recommend these overpriced and underperformed speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Book Editor

customer_reviews.title: These little speakers are great!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that they don't generate much base. Other than that, vocals are very clear. I've attached these to a HDTV and people's voices really stand out and are much easier to hear as compared to the standard speakers that come with the TV.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like bass, but this
customer_reviews.text: It is unusual that these speakers have strong bass(but unnatural) and almost no high, middle so-so. I like bass, but this...it is not that. Quality is nice, but sound is not good for me. Nice try Bose. I will try Audioengine A2+ .
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Lots of bass for such a tiny size
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over which speakers to get since I started to listen to digital music and now it mattered. These are not cheap, but sound great. You do not need a subwoofer with these for music, which is amazing considering their size. I think a subwoofer would still be needed for action movies.
customer_reviews.author: JimDiamond

customer_reviews.title: I almost didn't get them because of the price but I liked how compact they are since I have very little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bose set ever! I almost didn't get them because of the price but I liked how compact they are since I have very little room on my desk. My only complaint is that the volume and power buttons are oddly placed on the left side of one of the speaker. Other than that I liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: love this set
customer_reviews.text: love this set!!!! this is the second set i have owned and the first set is like 10 years old in a smoky dusty stinky bar, and still holds up. this set is in my clean home, and is functioning fabulously. its nice to have rich quality.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new Bose computer speakers. The volume buttons are on the side of the speaker. I was concerned how easy it would be to control the sound down. The speakers are heavy and stay put well which makes it quite easy to use the volume buttons. They are small speakers but yet put out nice sound. I am very pleased with my new speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk speakers but not very loud for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: dch061

customer_reviews.title: Very good rich sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect match to my iMac computer. The sound is realistic and rich in treble and bass. It doesn't distort no matter how loud I play music...but the sound gets so loud that I can't keep it that high. I would recommend these speakers to anyone. The black color goes well next to my iMac that I didn't think would look good at first but now it just seems to match!
customer_reviews.author: Jodagr

customer_reviews.title: HOLY CRAP, I thought I only paid $200
customer_reviews.text: After 1/ 1/2 years the right speaker is rattling. HOLY CRAP, I thought I only paid $200, but this thing was actually $299 in 2016. Way over priced. It does have Crispy Base, but its a little bitsy base, not booming Base. Save your money, OVERPRICED !!!
customer_reviews.author: jc jay

customer_reviews.title: bose computer music monitor
customer_reviews.text: build quality is great. the main disadvantages in my opinion are: - excessive bass which is not clear enough & makes the midrange a bit muffled - the cable that connects the 2 speakers is attached to one of them instead of being detachable on both ends, thus being more prone to wear & tear. - the lack of a headphones jack to amplify the sound for headsphones listening
customer_reviews.author: Sat

customer_reviews.title: These speakers sound HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, these speakers get the job done. The sound is amazing. It has great separation with NO distortion (even when maxed out) at all. Music is clear as a bell. Movies come to life. These speakers are small, but they pack a BIG punch. I honestly couldn't be happier. Setup is a breeze too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Bose Computer MusicMonitor
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a small speaker, similar sound to companion II series but smaller. May sound a little boxy if placed in an enclosed space, like a book shelf. My only complaint is that there is no indication of volume level. So if you want to set it to 50% volume, it's guesswork.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great transaction and awesome speakers...you couldn't ask for more! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Makepeace

customer_reviews.title: however Bose hand down is the best. I bought these because they are bose
customer_reviews.text: I am not at my new home, however Bose hand down is the best. I bought these because they are bose.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Price

customer_reviews.title: very good speaker for film or games on your PC
customer_reviews.text: Though the price is a little bit higher when compared with other computer speakers in this size, it really deserve this price. With the two little speakers, you can even enjoy a film in a medium size room, you can hear the levels of the sounds, and this is what I'm doing. Watch a movie with a projector and the Bose Computer MusicMonitor, that's enough to constitute a little private cinema.
customer_reviews.author: ruiviva

customer_reviews.title: In the high-pitched sound, good voice, from the box sense of strong, clear voice level
customer_reviews.text: I think it is still very satisfied, really small size effect, especially when used to see the movie, then the sound of the feeling really like the cinema. In the high-pitched sound, good voice, from the box sense of strong, clear voice level, a higher resolution, bass have a certain dive, the level is clear, a sense of a sense of flexibility. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I am still listening to these babies even now, they work so well for BBQ's on the deck or in the kitchen off of my computer. Very nice sound
customer_reviews.author: peencho

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound from a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound from a small speaker. Does not have a booming bass but is very good for a two speaker system. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DBH2

customer_reviews.title: It's much betterr than my Sony speakers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one with much skepticism. At first when I played it, the sound seems OK but as I turned it up, the sound is really nice. The point of these speakers are authentic reproduction of sound. The speakers were exceptional and they sound just like live music I heard. I simply love it. Anyone with a small room like dorm room then the whole room will be filled with music. All in all, I now realize the superior caliber of these speakers and I recommended to all who want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Q. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the Best
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic for my desk bound laptop....this is the only brand I will purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers
customer_reviews.text: As all bosse products the quality of sound is unbelievable! You can't understand how's that produced in such little speakers. It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Agustina Maria

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but no plug in for earphones. Still Happy because I knew that before I ordered them. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good seller
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, remote works great. Seller gave a great deal, shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound small profile.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound these speakers put out. I am using them as a stand alone for my iPhone but they would be an excellent choice for a PC or laptop,
customer_reviews.author: AlexT7801

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased and satisfied with these fine sounding and good looking ...
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Bose delivers clean, clear and rich sound through these computer music monitor speakers that I have hooked up to my iMac computer. I'm very pleased and satisfied with these fine sounding and good looking speakers.
customer_reviews.author: A. V. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming speakers
customer_reviews.text: I got these speakers for gaming and I wasn't disappointed. When playing Alien Isolation I could literally FEEL the aliens footsteps getting closer to me. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Szklanecki

customer_reviews.title: Don't you love these speakers.
customer_reviews.text: You don't need the remote because the controls are placed well and intuitively within easy reach of your hand. The sound is Bose...and it's enough. The footprint is minimal and the design beautiful. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: JOHN S R DEACON

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound quality-but what else could one expect from Bose ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound quality-but what else could one expect from Bose. Exceptional full range sound, even without a sub-woofer for the bass!
customer_reviews.author: David Settles

customer_reviews.title: I was fool
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy it again. I thought it was a new product and I was very disappointed because it was a used product. Used products are much cheaper in Korea.
customer_reviews.author: Lee byoungchul

customer_reviews.title: very like listen to music
customer_reviews.text: Results in the mall, shopping malls, kind and good, packaging, transportation, without knocking, good sound quality, very like listen to music, it often is used.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good small speakers which can beat big speakers,but I bought a used one, it got a problem second day I received,so I have no choice to return it
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: i,ve bought this item for over a year now and I enjoyed listening the sounds every time. have'nt encountered problem of any kind. It is a BOSE and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: fast & promp shipment

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Computer Speakers..! I'm using this from last 3 years and I love it.. they are pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ekanth

customer_reviews.title: Super little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic midranges and basses from these ultra-tiny speakers! Nothing else out there comes close. But the price is steep. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Zantigar

customer_reviews.title: What sound!
customer_reviews.text: They are the best speakers for the price. What I liked about the speakers is the Bose sound and their size. I could not find any dislikes about these speakers. I would recommend these speakers to anyone who wants to enjoy the GREAT Bose sound. Remember, "you get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: Steve R Schuelein

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice sound reproduction...
customer_reviews.text: When I used this smal Music monitor, I was shocked by the nice sound reproduction of music monitor. It's so good for whose room is not big enough for set the 5.1 or x.1sound system, but needs good sound reproduction...
customer_reviews.author: hao

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this speakers
customer_reviews.text: I always been a bose fan, although a little pricey but worth it in the end if you want good sound and great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Net

customer_reviews.title: BOSE - AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who is a gamer. He loves them as much as his Bose surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C Winston

customer_reviews.title: Bose gone mad
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this is a $200.00, speaker, at best! Bose has gone mad with it's pricing....... The sound simply does not match the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Trakakis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. But its effect is not very distinct when you hear very closely and in lower volume.
customer_reviews.author: Shuqing Li

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific clear and powerful sound with great bass. Takes uo small amount of space
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Bose MusicMonitor speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love those speakers. For their size they sound awesome! Don't expect them to beat your home speakers, they are are competing at the small / portable size speakers. Sound good when you are close to them, if you step away the bass disappears.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Fridkin

customer_reviews.title: nice sound, excellent design!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker worked exactly as I expected. First class sound, excellent ergonomic designs, and the metallic style of the speaker box matches perfectly with my Macbook pro. I have never heard such nice sound from a pair of small PC speakers like this in my life. It especially does well when I play classic music (with bass from cello, brass, etc.). It really worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fu

customer_reviews.title: Small on space. Big on Sound
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I am not a fan of all things Bose. That said, I have two sets of these MusicMonitor speakers from Bose. One in the bedroom, the other in the office. They don't have very deep bass, but what they do have is an amazing rich and full sound at all volume levels. And about that bass, these little speakers will surprise you with how much bass they DO have. An impressive display of sound for such a small footprint, and an attractive design in both black and silver colors.
customer_reviews.author: HomeTheaterGuru

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sound from a Small Giant
customer_reviews.text: Bose says it all! Very easy to set up, simply plug and go. I admit I was a bit skeptical due to the size of the speakers but they blew me away when turned on. I spend a LOT of time on my PC and listen to tones of music via iTunes and I've not had any distortion of sound with these speakers. I did feel they were a bit overpriced but after experiencing the quality of Bose I'm sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jar head

customer_reviews.title: ..small speakers ...big sound!
customer_reviews.text: do not allowed the size of these speakers trick you. they are small but competent! simple/easy to set them up - big sound! i have couple sets working flawlessly with apple airport express. the only negative aspect is the size of the ac adapter - it could be smaller!! bose shoul work on it!!!
customer_reviews.author: CDeAlencar

customer_reviews.title: High Quality in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter for Christmas. She is a violinist so quality of sound is very important. Space was very limited, so we wanted high quality sound without the space required for a subwoofer. These speakers are perfect, excellent sound and plenty of volume for an average size bedroom. These speakers are perfect for a desk to listen to high quality music while studying, plenty of bass, quite surprising actually for the small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: DWood3

customer_reviews.title: Best in-room speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best in-room speaker. If you put'em in your living room you can just lay in bed and enjoy the music thats what I do when I get back from school lol
customer_reviews.author: Rufus Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker for this size
customer_reviews.text: This is a small speaker with the highest powerful and quality of sound. Amazing how Bose can make this, recommend if you willing to pay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin N.

customer_reviews.title: Performing good and space efficient
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for one of my best friend. He tried them as soon as I gave it to him. The sound performance was satisfying and it's easy to accomodate, on the desk or in the travel bag. My friend love these small speakers.
customer_reviews.author: CHEN YU

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how poor my old system was until now. WOW what a difference the Bose system makes!! I have a new computer with high-quality sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Elam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers with great sound, little bit overpriced for my taste as every BOSE speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Vanja Litovic

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: sleek design will illuminate your desk. Its size is much smaller than expected. The sound is very powerful. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality although small speakers. I was very ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality although small speakers. I was very impressed with the bass response (bassoon, bass in jazz pieces). I listen to a lot of music from my computer amd replaced the original cheap speakers with these. An immense improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Barry W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Audio For A PC . .. hands down . ..
customer_reviews.author: W. Wulff

customer_reviews.title: Typical Bose product: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound, small enough to fit anywhere, easy to set up, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Performance
customer_reviews.text: It delivers stellar sound quality,impressive bass-punch with elegant simplicity from a small speaker.Though a bit pricey,but it provides highest-accuracy musical performance possible in that product line.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Will blow your socks off.....
customer_reviews.text: If you like to listen to sounds, especially music, then the MusicMonitor is a good choice and will blow your socks off.
customer_reviews.author: Spod

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, expensive, and not bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one reason: they're the perfect size to fit under my monitor. I was hoping for passable sound quality, and that's what these deliver. There's no deep bass, and there's no natural highs. The one tiny speaker has been equalized to reproduce more than it's naturally capable of doing, so it sounds fake. As long as you don't expect too much from these speakers, you'll probably like them.
customer_reviews.author: BobMac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today. I am impressed with the sound quality and how clear it is along with how the bass resonates out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Momont

customer_reviews.title: I like the boss speaker
customer_reviews.text: I like the boss speaker very much. It is easy and convinences to carry out. The sound quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: good boy

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: Bose® Computer MusicMonitor® -- Black not bad but Money is not good.. . . . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: An Jee Hwan

customer_reviews.title: Made in china! Why?
customer_reviews.text: I bought in America, why is the Chinese goods... But the quality is still good so give you 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wang Dan

product_meta.title: Bose Computer MusicMonitor -- Silver
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverFROM THE MANUFACTURER


BOSE - BETTER SOUND THROUGH RESEARCH
Dedication to research and excellence. It's been the Bose approach to better sound since Dr. Amar G. Bose founded the company in 1964. But the commitment actually began years earlier. 

In the late 1950s, Dr. Bose, then a graduate student, purchased a stereo system based on its impressive technical specifications. The avid music enthusiast was disappointed to discover the speakers didn't reproduce the sound of a live performance--and he became determined to recreate that lifelike audio experience for listeners. 

After extensive research, Dr. Bose and colleagues introduced the groundbreaking 901 Direct/Reflecting speakers in 1968. Their lifelike sound won immediate and widespread acclaim. 

Since those early days of 901 speakers, Bose engineers have kept their focus on creating better technology. You'll find that focus exemplified in the Computer MusicMonitor, with advances that ensure premium performance and convenience. 




EXCEPTIONAL AUDIO QUALITY IN AN ELEGANT, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN
Premium Two-Speaker Bose System for Computers 

This premium two-piece computer speaker system is also the smallest from Bose, yet it delivers sound well beyond its size. Computer MusicMonitor is recommended if your laptop or PC is a prime source of entertainment, you're particular about audio quality and you want an elegant yet unobtrusive system. 

Until now, high quality desktop sound with convincing low notes has come only from large speakers or a three-piece system with a bass module. The MusicMonitor computer sound system is an alternative for serious listeners who prefer a two-piece solution offering exceptional performance, simplicity--and more desktop space. 

This unexpected sound quality results from the latest in Bose amplifier technology, combined with highly efficient neodymium speakers and Bose digital signal processing. The system's proprietary amplifiers are smaller, lighter and more efficient than traditional linear amplifiers to help keep speakers small--yet powerful. Active electronic equalization balances low, mid and high frequencies for more natural tone and clarity. Acoustic design features dual internal opposing passive radiators for unusually deep, powerful low tones from a very small multimedia speaker system. 

Setup is easy--you'll need only one cable connection to your computer or auxiliary sources. Volume and power controls are on the right speaker. Or, use the handy remote control that comes with the system. And the speakers are magnetically shielded, so you can place them near your monitor without worrying about monitor interference or damage to magnetic media. To use the Computer MusicMonitor with other audio sources, just unplug the connection to your computer and connect the other audio source to the audio input. 

Enjoy the fullness and detail you may have been missing from your favorite downloads, Internet radio and much more, simply and elegantly. The system's understated, space-saving design and elegant brushed aluminum enclosure complement any workspace and fits nicely almost anywhere in your home. 

Lifelike Performance 

Experience sound well beyond the speakers' size--and free up valuable desktop space. 

Elegant Finish 

These compact speakers are finished in brushed aluminum to complement any laptop, PC and workspace. 

Power and Volume Controls 

Both power and volume are located on the handy remote and right computer speaker. 

High Output 

Computer MusicMonitor speakers feature thin but powerful neodymium transducers with 10 times the magnetic energy density of conventional speaker magnets. 

Easy Connectivity 

One-cable connection to computer or auxiliary sources. 

Proprietary Acoustic Design 

Dual internal opposing passive radiators provide unusually deep, powerful low tones from a very small multimedia speaker system. 

Proprietary Amplifiers 

The amplifiers in Computer MusicMonitor are smaller, lighter and more efficient than traditional linear amplifiers. This helps keep the speakers small yet powerful. 

Active Electronic Equalization 

The active EQ balances low, mid and high frequencies for more natural tone and clarity. 

Magnetically Shielded Speakers 

Computer MusicMonitor speakers are magnetically shielded to prevent monitor interference or damage to magnetic media. 

What's in the Box 

 * Two MusicMonitor speakers 
 * Speaker cable 
 * AC power cord 
 * Demonstration DVD
 * Power pack with attached cable 
 * Remote control 
 * Audio input cable






SIMILAR BOSE PRODUCTS TO CONSIDER
>
feature_bullets: Deep, realistic low tones--without a bass module--from proprietary technologies
Elegant brushed aluminum casing complements any laptop, PC and workspace
Volume and power controls located discreetly on side of right speaker, or use handy remote
Speakers connect to your laptop, PC or a portable audio source with provided cable; A/C power pack also included

Surprisingly rich sound performance from a small, two-piece desktop system. Right speaker (with controls):12.2 cm H x 6.5 cm W x 12.3 cm D (0.5 kg) , Left speaker:12.2 cm H x 6.5 cm W x 12.3 cm D (0.5 kg)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars186 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
